name: Ship Happens!
description:
“Ship Happens!” is a light-hearted, yet fast-paced PvP party game, in which players in teams of two jump into the role of pirates that steal from ships using grappling hooks. It is targeted toward sociable players from any age range, that enjoy laid-back competition. While merchant ships continue passing between the two player ships, you and your partner compete against the other team of pirates on who can acquire more cargo.

This game was made as a semester project at the Cologne Game Lab.
